member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.EntryGUID
member.summary: Entry GUID containing the latest balance entry.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.CreatedUtc
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the account was created.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.BalanceTimestampUtc
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the most recent balance was calculated.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.CommittedBalance
member.summary: Committed balance available in the account. This balance does not include pending debits and credits.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.PendingBalance
member.summary: Pending balance in the account. This balance includes pending credits and debits.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.PendingCredits
member.summary: Pending credits. These transactions are not reflected in the committed balance.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Balance.PendingDebits
member.summary: Pending debits. These transactions are not reflected in the committed balance.

member.name: T:NetLedger.Entry
member.summary: An entry in the ledger for a given account.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.Replaces
member.summary: Specifies the GUID of the entry that this entry is replacing. Used only by balance entries.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.IsCommitted
member.summary: Indicates if the entry has been committed to the ledger and is reflected in the current balance.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.CommittedByGUID
member.summary: GUID of the entry that committed this entry.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.CommittedUtc
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the entry was committed.

member.name: P:NetLedger.Entry.CreatedUtc
member.summary: UTC timestamp when the entry was created.

Indicate whether or not the entry has already been included in the balance of the account.

member.name: T:NetLedger.EntryType
member.summary: The type of entry in the ledger.

member.summary: Maximum number of results to retrieve.

member.summary: The number of records to skip.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.CreatedAfterUtc
member.summary: Only include entries created on or after this timestamp UTC.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.CreatedBeforeUtc
member.summary: Only include entries created on or before this timestamp UTC.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.AmountMinimum
member.summary: Only include entries with an amount greater than or equal to this value.

member.name: P:NetLedger.EnumerationQuery.AmountMaximum
member.summary: Only include entries with an amount less than or equal to this value.

Indicates if the entry should be immediately committed.

Indicates if the entry should be immediately committed.

Indicates if transactions should be immediately committed.

member.summary: Retrieve a list of pending entries for a given account.

member.summary: Retrieve a list of pending credits for a given account.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Ledger.GetPendingDebitsAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieve a list of pending debits for a given account.
Retrieve a list of entries matching the specified conditions.
member.param: Search term that must appear in the entry description.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Ledger.EnumerateTransactionsAsync(NetLedger.EnumerationQuery,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Enumerate transactions in a paginated way.
member.param: Enumeration query containing account GUID, pagination parameters, and ordering.
member.returns: Enumeration result containing the page of entries and metadata for continuing the enumeration.
member.exception: Thrown when skip and continuation token are both specified.
Thrown when the specified account does not exist.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Ledger.GetBalanceAsync(System.Guid,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieve balance details for a given account.
member.param: Indicate whether or not the account should be locked during retrieval of balance details. Leave this value as 'true'.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Ledger.CommitEntriesAsync(System.Guid,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid},System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Commit pending entries to the balance. Specify entries to commit using the guids property, or leave it null to commit all pending entries.
member.param: List of entry GUIDs to commit. Leave null to commit all pending entries.
Indicate whether or not the account should be locked during retrieval of balance details. Leave this value as 'true'.

member.name: M:NetLedger.Ledger.GetBalanceAsOfAsync(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the balance of an account as of a specific timestamp.
member.returns: Balance as of the specified timestamp.

member.returns: True if the chain is valid.
